00026   template<typename REAL>
00027   class Vector : public std::vector<REAL>  // inherit from the STL vector
00028   {
00029   public:
00031         typedef std::size_t size_type;
00032 
00033   private:
00034         static bool bScientific;
00035         static std::size_t nIndexWidth;
00036         static std::size_t nValueWidth;
00037         static std::size_t nValuePrecision;
00038 
00039   public:
00040   
00041         // default constructor, also inherited from the STL vector default constructor
00042         Vector() : std::vector<REAL>() 
00043         {
00044         }
00045   
00046         // another constructor, with arguments, setting the default value for all entries of the vector of given size
00047         Vector( const size_t size,                 // user must specify the size
00048                         const REAL defaultvalue_ = 0    // if not specified, the value 0 will take effect
00049                         )
00050           : std::vector<REAL>( size, defaultvalue_ ) 
00051         {
00052         }
00053         
00054         
00055         // Methods:
00056         
00076         Vector& operator=( const REAL value )
00077         {
00078           const size_t s = this->size();
00079           Vector & self = *this;
00080           for(size_t i=0; i<s; ++i)
00081                 self[i] = value;
00082           return *this;
00083         }
00084

00118 #ifdef DOXYGEN
00119         Vector& operator=( const Vector& y )
00120         {
00121       // It is already implemented in the STL vector class itself!
00122         }
00123 #endif
00124         
00125         
00126         
00127         // Multiplication by a scalar value: x *= value
00128         Vector& operator*=( const REAL value )
00129         {
00130           Vector &self = *this;
00131           for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i)
00132                 self[i] *= value;
00133           return *this;
00134         }
00135         
00136         
00137         // Division by a scalar value: x /= value
00138         Vector& operator/=( const REAL value )
00139         {
00140           Vector &self = *this;
00141           for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i)
00142                 self[i] /= value;
00143           return *this;
00144         }
00145         
00146         
00147         // Add another vector: x += y
00148         Vector& operator+=( const Vector & y )
00149         {
00150           assert( this->size() == y.size());
00151           Vector &self = *this;
00152           for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i)
00153                 self[i] += y[i];
00154           return *this;
00155         }
00156         
00157         
00158         // Subtract another vector: x -= y
00159         Vector& operator-=( const Vector & y )
00160         {
00161           assert( this->size() == y.size());
00162           Vector &self = *this;
00163           for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i)
00164                 self[i] -= y[i];
00165           return *this;
00166         }
00167         
00168         
00169         // Update vector by addition of a scaled vector: 
00170         // x += alpha * y
00171         //
00172         Vector & update(const REAL alpha, const Vector & y) 
00173         {
00174           assert( this->size() == y.size());
00175           Vector &self = *this;
00176           for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i)
00177                 self[i] += alpha * y[i];
00178           return *this;
00179         }
00180         
00181         
00213         REAL operator*(Vector & x) const 
00214         {
00215           assert( x.size() == this->size() );   // checks if the dimensions of the two vectors are equal
00216           REAL sum( 0 );
00217           const Vector & self = *this;
00218           for( size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i )
00219                 sum += self[i] * x[i];
00220           return sum;
00221         }
00222         
00223 
00224 
00225 
00258         Vector operator+(Vector & x) const 
00259         {
00260           assert( x.size() == this->size() );   // checks if the dimensions of the two vectors are equal
00261       Vector sum( *this );
00262       sum += x;
00263           return sum;
00264         }
00265 
00266 
00267 
00300         Vector operator-(Vector & x) const 
00301         {
00302           assert( x.size() == this->size() );   // checks if the dimensions of the two vectors are equal
00303       Vector sum( *this );
00304       sum -= x;
00305           return sum;
00306         }
00307 
00308 
00309         
00311         REAL two_norm_2() const 
00312         {
00313           REAL sum( 0 );
00314           const Vector & self = *this;
00315           for (size_t i = 0; i < (size_t) this->size(); ++i)
00316                 sum += self[i] * self[i];
00317           return sum;
00318         }
00319         
00344         REAL two_norm() const 
00345         {
00346           return sqrt(two_norm_2());
00347         }
00348         
00350         bool scientific() const 
00351         {
00352           return bScientific;
00353         }
00354         
00382     void scientific(bool b) const 
00383     {
00384       bScientific=b;
00385     }

00387     std::size_t width() const 
00388         {
00389           return nValueWidth;
00390         }
00391

00393     {
00394       nValueWidth=i;
00395     }
00396

00398         {
00399           return nIndexWidth;
00400         }
00401

00403     {
00404       nIndexWidth=i;
00405     }

00408         {
00409           return nValuePrecision;

00455   template <typename REAL>
00456   inline std::ostream & operator <<(std::ostream & os, const Vector<REAL> & x) 
00457   {
00458         os << std::endl;
00459         
00460         for (size_t r = 0; r < x.size(); ++r)
00461           {
00462                 if( x.scientific() )
00463                   {
00464                         os << "[" 
00465                            << std::setw(x.iwidth())
00466                            << r 
00467                            << "]"
00468                            << std::scientific 
00469                            << std::showpoint 
00470                            << std::setw( x.width() ) 
00471                            << std::setprecision( x.precision() ) 
00472                            << x[r] 
00473                            << std::endl;
00474                   }
00475                 else
00476                   {
00477                         os << "[" 
00478                            << std::setw(x.iwidth())
00479                            << r 
00480                            << "]"
00481                            << std::fixed 
00482                            << std::showpoint 
00483                            << std::setw( x.width() ) 
00484                            << std::setprecision( x.precision() ) 
00485                            << x[r] 
00486                            << std::endl;
00487                   }
00488           }
00489         return os;
00490   }

00516   template<typename REAL>
00517   inline void gnuplot(
00518                                           const std::string& fname, 
00519                                           const Vector<REAL> x 
00520                                           )
00521   {
00522         std::fstream f(fname.c_str(),std::ios::out); 
00523         for (typename Vector<REAL>::size_type i=0; i<x.size(); i++)
00524           {
00525                 if( x.scientific() )
00526                   {
00527                         f << std::setw(x.width())
00528                           << i
00529                           << std::scientific
00530                           << std::showpoint 
00531                           << std::setw( x.width() ) 
00532                           << std::setprecision( x.precision() ) 
00533                           << x[i] 
00534                           << std::endl;
00535                   }
00536                 else
00537                   {
00538                         f << std::setw(x.width())
00539                           << i
00540                           << std::fixed 
00541                           << std::showpoint 
00542                           << std::setw( x.width() ) 
00543                           << std::setprecision( x.precision() ) 
00544                           << x[i] 
00545                           << std::endl;
00546                   }
00547           }
00548         f.close();
00549   }

00552   template<typename REAL>
00553   inline void gnuplot(
00554                                           const std::string& fname, 
00555                                           const Vector<REAL> x, 
00556                                           const Vector<REAL> y
00557                                           )
00558   {
00559         std::fstream f(fname.c_str(),std::ios::out); 
00560         for (typename Vector<REAL>::size_type i=0; i<x.size(); i++)
00561           {
00562                 if( x.scientific() )
00563                   {
00564                         f << std::setw(x.width())
00565                           << i
00566                           << std::scientific
00567                           << std::showpoint 
00568                           << std::setw( x.width() ) 
00569                           << std::setprecision( x.precision() ) 
00570                           << x[i] 
00571                           << " " 
00572                           << std::setw( x.width() ) 
00573                           << std::setprecision( x.precision() ) 
00574                           << y[i] 
00575                           << std::endl;
00576                   }
00577                 else
00578                   {
00579                         f << std::setw(x.width())
00580                           << i
00581                           << std::fixed 
00582                           << std::showpoint 
00583                           << std::setw( x.width() ) 
00584                           << std::setprecision( x.precision() ) 
00585                           << x[i] 
00586                           << " " 
00587                           << std::setw( x.width() ) 
00588                           << std::setprecision( x.precision() ) 
00589                           << y[i] 
00590                           << std::endl;
00591                   }
00592           }
00593         
00594         f.close();
00595   }

00627   template<typename REAL>
00628   inline void readVectorFromFile (const std::string& filename, Vector<REAL> &vector)
00629   {
00630     std::string buffer;
00631     std::ifstream fin( filename.c_str() );
00632     if( fin.is_open() ){
00633       while( fin ){
00634         std::string sub;
00635         fin >> sub;
00636         //std::cout << " sub = " << sub.c_str() << ": ";
00637         if( sub.length()>0 ){
00638           REAL a = atof(sub.c_str());
00639           //std::cout << std::fixed << std::setw(10) << std::setprecision(5) << a;
00640           vector.push_back(a);
00641         }
00642       }
00643       fin.close();
00644     }
00645     else{
00646       HDNUM_ERROR("Could not open file!");
00647     }
00648   }

00652   template<class REAL>
00653   inline void zero (Vector<REAL>& x)
00654   {
00655     for (typename Vector<REAL>::size_type i=0; i<x.size(); i++)
00656       x[i] = REAL(0);
00657   }
00658 
00660   template<class REAL>
00661   inline REAL norm (Vector<REAL> x)
00662   {
00663     REAL sum(0.0);
00664     for (typename Vector<REAL>::size_type i=0; i<x.size(); i++)
00665       sum += x[i]*x[i];
00666     return sqrt(sum);
00667   }
00668 
00670   template<class REAL>
00671   inline void fill (Vector<REAL>& x, const REAL t)
00672   {
00673     for (typename Vector<REAL>::size_type i=0; i<x.size(); i++)
00674       x[i] = t;
00675   }
00676 
00699   template<class REAL>
00700   inline void fill (Vector<REAL>& x, const REAL& t, const REAL& dt)
00701   {
00702     REAL myt(t);
00703     for (typename Vector<REAL>::size_type i=0; i<x.size(); i++)
00704       {
00705         x[i] = myt;
00706         myt += dt;
00707       }
00708   }

00733   template<class REAL>
00734   inline void unitvector (Vector<REAL> & x, std::size_t j)
00735   {
00736     for (typename Vector<REAL>::size_type i=0; i<x.size(); i++)
00737       if (i==j)
00738         x[i] = REAL(1);
00739       else
00740         x[i] = REAL(0);
00741   }
